attributes.action: Limit Isolation in ALL schools to 1 hour maximum per day
attributes.additional_details: Children are being punished for things out of their control. Children are individuals and should be treat this way. Stop treating children as numbers as though they are in a prison, 1 councillor should be available at each school for children who need someone to speak to.
attributes.background:
If a child is late to school, cannot afford correct shoes, has a reason why they haven't done their homework do not punish our children by isolation. Instead contact parents/care giver and speak to child as an individual
If isolation is needed for bad behaviour this to be limited to 1 hour per day

rejection.details:
We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Ban use of isolation booths in schools: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/585045
